shootingcapacity: Approx. 315 shots when using LCD monitor, Approx. 335 shots when using Electronic Viewfinder
powersource: Battery Pack NB-10L, Compact Power Adapter CA-PS700 (included with AC Adapter Kit ACK-DC80)
label12: Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 58 predefined shooting situations and the Face ID function adjusts focus and exposure priority based on pre-registered faces
label13: Full range of shooting and recording modes including RAW+JPEG for the ultimate creative control
label10: Intelligent IS automatically chooses from six different modes to optimize image stabilization for the shooting condition
label11: Bright 2.8-inch Vari-angle LCD with 461,000 dots for shooting at a variety of angles, plus an Electronic Viewfinder
label14: Built-in hot shoe allows compatibility with optional Speedlite flashes for additional lighting options
lcdmonitor: 2.8-inch TFT Colour Vari-angle LCD with wide viewing angle
other: SD memory card slot; direct connection to Canon SELPHY, PIXMA Photo Printers & PictBridge compatible printers
exposurecontrolmethod: Manual Exposure, Program Shift, Safety Shift, AE Lock
label8: Capture stunning 1080p Full HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button; zoom while shooting and play back videos on an HDTV via the HDMI output
label9: High Speed AF greatly improves focus speed and High-Speed Burst HQ allows for continuous capture at a maximum of 10 frames while maintaining superb image quality
flashrange: 1.6 ft. - 18 ft. (W), 4.6 - 9.8 ft. (T) (50cm - 5.5m (W), (1.4m - 3.0m (T)). Image brightness may diminish depending on the shooting distance
label5: 12.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor combined with a DIGIC 5 Image Processor creates the Canon HS SYSTEM for improved low-light performance up to ISO 6400 and enhanced image quality
label6: 50x Optical Zoom lens in a compact digital camera, which goes all the way from a wide-angle 24mm to 1200mm (3
whitebalancecontrol: Auto*, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Custom 1, Custom 2
lightmeteringmethod: Evaluative*, Center-weighted average, Spot**  * Facial brightness is evaluated in Face Detection AF   ** Metering frame is fixed to the center
label7: The PowerShot SX50 HS also features the additional benefit of Zoom Framing Assist Seek and Lock functions, for easy tracking of and keeping the subject centered in the frame until you capture the image
shutterspeed: 1-1/2000 sec.; 15-1/2000 sec. (in Tv and M modes)
videoout: NTSC/PAL (dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video); Mini-HDMI connector
audioout: Stereo (dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video)
builtinflash: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off - Facial brightness is also evaluated in Face Detect.
storagemedia: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
label41: * Camera automatically sets the optimal ISO speed according to shooting mode
fileformat: Design rule for camera file system, DPOF Version 1.1 compliant
